title: EM Macdonald - A Short History of the Inquisition.pdf
description:
A SHORT HISTORY OF THE INQUISITION - WHAT IT WAS AND WHAT IT DID
To which is appended an Account of Persecutions by Protestants, Persecutions of Witches, The War Between Religion and Science, and the Attitude of the American Churches Toward African Slavery ..

By: E.M. Macdonald (1907)

An Excellent historical account to the Inquisition as well to other crimes of Christianity.
